China: Battle of Xiangyang: Kublai ordered his general Aju to take Xiangyang.
England: Henry recognised the authority of Llywelyn ap Gruffudd in Gwynedd.
India: The Mahanubhava philosophy established by Chakradhar Swami.
Spain: Alfonso the Wise and Afonso III signed the Treaty of Badajoz, a pact of friendship and mutual assistance. The treaty established the border between Castile and Portugal to the latter's disadvantage.
